name: Retro Guy Goes To Hell
description:
Level Types:

Survival:

To finish each level you'll have to make all the squares reach the target color. Everytime you walk on a square, its color changes. Enemies, and traps will try to kill you. You have no weapons. Use traps to your advantage or just avoid the enemies and complete the level.

Puzzle:

Make the squares reach the target color. There are three kinds of squares. Some of them will change your direction and others will stop you from moving. Step on the "switch" squares to alter the "directional squares". Try not to fall off the edges.

Boss:

Defeat the boss.

Controls:

  • Move: → ←↑ ↓
